source:
TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Mussalfret is awfully worried about something.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Mussalfret is awfully worried about something.

source:
TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_SEQ_01<tab>Mussalfret informs you that his son, Verpaulaine, has recently fled the family home after a fight and asks you to try and convince him to return. You head to a local park in search of the disgruntled youth.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_SEQ_01<tab>Mussalfret informs you that his son, Verpaulaine, has recently fled the family home after a fight and asks you to try and convince him to return. You head to a local park in search of the disgruntled youth.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_SEQ_02<tab>You find Verpaulaine, but he vanishes once more. Undeterred, you begin your search anew.
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_SEQ_02<tab>You find Verpaulaine, but he vanishes once more. Undeterred, you begin your search anew.

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_SEQ_03<tab>After tracking down Verpaulaine, you learn that he is concerned by a change in the color of Labyrinthos's artificial sunlight. The boy says he wishes to look into the cause himself and you gladly agree to help him.
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_SEQ_03<tab>After tracking down Verpaulaine, you learn that he is concerned by a change in the color of Labyrinthos's artificial sunlight. The boy says he wishes to look into the cause himself and you gladly agree to help him.

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_MUSSALFRET_000_001<tab>Ah, you're that adventurer who helped out the Students of Baldesion, aren't you? I suppose it matters not to you, but my son seems to have run away...
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_MUSSALFRET_000_001<tab>Ah, you're that adventurer who helped out the Students of Baldesion, aren't you? I suppose it matters not to you, but my son seems to have run away...

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_A1_000_001<tab>Why was there a child here in the first place?
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_A1_000_001<tab>Why was there a child here in the first place?

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_A1_000_002<tab>I thought only researchers lived here.
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_A1_000_002<tab>I thought only researchers lived here.

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_MUSSALFRET_000_002<tab>Ah, yes. Simply put, my wife and I work at Aporia and she happened to conceive whilst we were living here in Sharlayan Hamlet.
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_MUSSALFRET_000_002<tab>Ah, yes. Simply put, my wife and I work at Aporia and she happened to conceive whilst we were living here in Sharlayan Hamlet.

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_MUSSALFRET_000_003<tab>I assure you we had many sleepless nights wondering if we should quit our jobs and leave Labyrinthos, or entrust the child to a friend of ours who dwells somewhere more suitable.
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_MUSSALFRET_000_003<tab>I assure you we had many sleepless nights wondering if we should quit our jobs and leave Labyrinthos, or entrust the child to a friend of ours who dwells somewhere more suitable.

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_MUSSALFRET_000_004<tab>Ultimately, we decided to continue our work whilst raising the child here. After all, our research is focused on the very future that our offspring will inhabit.
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_MUSSALFRET_000_004<tab>Ultimately, we decided to continue our work whilst raising the child here. After all, our research is focused on the very future that our offspring will inhabit.

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_MUSSALFRET_000_005<tab>The issue is, however, that the magic that prevents us from revealing anything confidential is too potent to be used on children.
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_MUSSALFRET_000_005<tab>The issue is, however, that the magic that prevents us from revealing anything confidential is too potent to be used on children.

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_MUSSALFRET_000_006<tab>Of course, we can't allow the little one to roam freely─there's no telling what he might impart unto others─so he has spent his entire life thus far within the confines of Sharlayan Hamlet.
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_MUSSALFRET_000_006<tab>Of course, we can't allow the little one to roam freely─there's no telling what he might impart unto others─so he has spent his entire life thus far within the confines of Sharlayan Hamlet.

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_MUSSALFRET_000_007<tab>We recently had a slight spat with him and, well, he decided to flee.
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_MUSSALFRET_000_007<tab>We recently had a slight spat with him and, well, he decided to flee.

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_MUSSALFRET_000_008<tab>I imagine me going after him would only make things worse. Could I ask you to talk to him in my stead? I'm sure he'd be much more willing to listen to...er, anyone other than his parents, at this point.
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_MUSSALFRET_000_008<tab>I imagine me going after him would only make things worse. Could I ask you to talk to him in my stead? I'm sure he'd be much more willing to listen to...er, anyone other than his parents, at this point.

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_MUSSALFRET_000_009<tab>Thank you! Verpaulaine─my boy─is most likely in the plaza to the east. I cannot imagine he struck out any further on his own.
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_MUSSALFRET_000_009<tab>Thank you! Verpaulaine─my boy─is most likely in the plaza to the east. I cannot imagine he struck out any further on his own.

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_MUSSALFRET_000_015<tab>Verpaulaine ought to be in the plaza to the east. Or so I hope...
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_MUSSALFRET_000_015<tab>Verpaulaine ought to be in the plaza to the east. Or so I hope...

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_VERPAULAINE_000_030<tab>I am <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> going to go home so easily!
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_VERPAULAINE_000_030<tab>I am <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> going to go home so easily!

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_VERPAULAINE_000_031<tab>You probably won't believe me either, but I've noticed that all is not right in Labyrinthos.
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_VERPAULAINE_000_031<tab>You probably won't believe me either, but I've noticed that all is not right in Labyrinthos.

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_A2_000_001<tab>Why don't you try telling me first?
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_A2_000_001<tab>Why don't you try telling me first?

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_A2_000_002<tab>I can decide what to believe on my own, thank you.
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_A2_000_002<tab>I can decide what to believe on my own, thank you.

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_VERPAULAINE_000_032<tab>Fine, I shall tell you what I've seen. The color of the artificial light here changed recently.
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_VERPAULAINE_000_032<tab>Fine, I shall tell you what I've seen. The color of the artificial light here changed recently.

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_VERPAULAINE_000_033<tab>I'm sure most people haven't noticed, but when you've spent your whole life here, the difference is like...like night and day!
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_VERPAULAINE_000_033<tab>I'm sure most people haven't noticed, but when you've spent your whole life here, the difference is like...like night and day!

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_VERPAULAINE_000_034<tab>Even so, no one will take me seriously when I bring it up. All because of my age! Got into a big fight with Father about it...
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_VERPAULAINE_000_034<tab>Even so, no one will take me seriously when I bring it up. All because of my age! Got into a big fight with Father about it...

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_VERPAULAINE_000_035<tab>But Labyrinthos is in danger! Who knows what would happen if the artificial sun broke...
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_VERPAULAINE_000_035<tab>But Labyrinthos is in danger! Who knows what would happen if the artificial sun broke...

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_VERPAULAINE_000_036<tab>That's why I can't go home just yet. I need to get to the bottom of this first.
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_VERPAULAINE_000_036<tab>That's why I can't go home just yet. I need to get to the bottom of this first.

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_VERPAULAINE_000_037<tab>Although...I am scared to venture outside on my own. They say there's countless monsters out there...
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_VERPAULAINE_000_037<tab>Although...I am scared to venture outside on my own. They say there's countless monsters out there...

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_VERPAULAINE_000_038<tab>I don't suppose you would come with me? I could pay you! It's not much, but I do get pocket money from my parents.
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_VERPAULAINE_000_038<tab>I don't suppose you would come with me? I could pay you! It's not much, but I do get pocket money from my parents.

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_A3_000_002<tab>You don't need to pay me.
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_A3_000_002<tab>You don't need to pay me.

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_VERPAULAINE_000_039<tab>I thought you were different from the rest, but now you're treating me like a child too.
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_VERPAULAINE_000_039<tab>I thought you were different from the rest, but now you're treating me like a child too.

source: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_VERPAULAINE_000_040<tab>This is a proper deal, all right? You've got to take my money to make it binding.
target: TEXT_AKTKZI101_04484_VERPAULAINE_000_040<tab>This is a proper deal, all right? You've got to take my money to make it binding.
